text: The Furness Railway K1 and K2 Classes were a class of 12 British 4-4-0 Steam Locomotives built for the Furness Railway between 1890 and 1900 . These locomotives operated pulling passenger trains and goods trains until the LMS railway (formed in 1923) scrapped all of them between 1924-1931 .
title: Furness Railway K Class 4-4-0
